amendment.description: An amendment numbered 289 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to increase and decrease by $1,000,000 funding for the National Infrastructure Investments (BUILD grants).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A096) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A096) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A096) offered by Ms. Pressley.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
